about_the_game:
Welcome to Dragon Uprising Online!

About the Game:

Welcome to the Playtest version of Dragon Uprising Online! Developed solo, this project is a labor of love, created to explore its potential and gather feedback. If the concept resonates with players, I'll consider further development and enhancements. Dive in and join the adventure!

Game Overview:

Dragon Uprising Online is all about teaming up with friends to tackle epic boss battles in cooperative multiplayer. Create your unique character, customize their appearance and gear, and embark on thrilling adventures together. Whether you're seeking glory, loot, or just good times with pals, this game has something for everyone.

Key Features:

Character Customization:

Personalize your avatar and gear to stand out in style. While customization options are currently limited, future updates may expand them based on player interest and community contributions.

Village HUB:

Gather in the central hub to meet NPCs, pick up quests, and craft items. Play offline or join dedicated servers to interact with other players.

Crafting and Upgrading:

Craft and enhance your equipment by communicating with specific NPCs. Experiment with theorycrafting using gemstones and unlockable slots.

Multiclass System:

Switch between different classes, each with unique stats and active/passive abilities. Experiment with diverse playstyles and combinations.

Weapon Mastery:

Master up to four weapons per gameplay session, out of eight available types. Each weapon has its own skills and combos, offering endless strategic possibilities.

Combat Mechanics:

Chain up to three skills per key press, with six total keys for each weapon type. Unleash devastating combos and unleash the full potential of your arsenal.

Elemental System:

Harness the power of elemental attributes to enhance your spells and abilities, influencing gameplay dynamics.

Boss Challenges:

Take on bosses of varying difficulty levels, each with their own rankings and rewards. Challenge yourself in modulated difficulty levels for increased XP and loot.

Drop Bar System:

Eliminate excessive grinding with a drop bar mechanic. Fill the bar to guarantee a weapon drop from bosses, ensuring a fair reward system for players.

Build System:

Customize multiple builds for your character, each with its own set of gear and class parameters. Easily switch between presets for different playstyles and situations.

Join the Playtest today and become part of the Dragon Uprising community!

name: Dragon Uprising Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: An action game mainly focused on boss rushing in coop !
